column4: <--- newbie to ubuntu just downloaded it today.. had a few quick questions with gfx / audio / mouse configuration if anyone has the time could possibly msg me?
anyone familiar with lunix / quake 3 / live configurations? =/
quake3 playing client, or dedicated server?

i just installed ubuntu im completly new to this OS... but ive been doing some reading.. got some stuff.. dont know what i did last... but i believe i updated my vid card driver.. now when i try to load quake... its all choppy with no sound...
now i have no audio... nor the game play is all choppy =/
what gfx card do you have?
i just installed this ubuntu today and he had me change soem stuff in xorg.conf /etc/X11 and now my game i was playing is all messed up
possibly anybody might know if it was an error in that file.
gfx is messed up and sound is gone
anyone have any ideas why i have no audio?
i had a friend give me some commands to put in /etc/X11/xorg.congf but i believe it has messed up my GFX and as well as my sound .. im a new user to ubuntu
still around friend, that took longer than expected
